validation_failed_blueprint.description:
The blueprinted script "{name}" (`{entity_id}`) failed to set up.

Error:`{error}`.

To fix this error, [edit the script]({edit}) to correct it, then save and reload the script configuration.
validation_failed_blueprint.title: Script {name} failed to set up

validation_failed_schema.description:
The script "{name}" (`{entity_id}`) is not active because the configuration has errors.

Error:`{error}`.

To fix this error, [edit the script]({edit}) to correct it, then save and reload the script configuration.
validation_failed_schema.title: Script {name} failed to set up

validation_failed_sequence.description:
The script "{name}" (`{entity_id}`) is not active because its sequence could not be set up.

Error:`{error}`.

To fix this error, [edit the script]({edit}) to correct it, then save and reload the script configuration.
validation_failed_sequence.title: Script {name} failed to set up

toggle.description: Starts a script if it isn't running, stops it otherwise.
toggle.name: Toggle

turn_on.description: Runs the sequence of actions defined in a script.
turn_on.name: Turn on
